original_text: One of the women who listened to us was called Lydia. She was from the city of Thyatira. She bought and sold expensive dark red cloth. She was a Gentile woman who now worshipped God. The Lord helped her to understand Paul's message. So she believed the things that he said.
korean_text: 두아디라 시에 있는 자색 옷감 장사로서 하나님을 섬기는 루디아라 하는 한 여자가 말을 듣고 있을 때 주께서 그 마음을 열어 바울의 말을 따르게 하신지라

sentences.original_text: One of the women who listened to us
sentences.korean_translation: 우리의 말을 듣던 여자 중 한 사람이

sentences.original_text: She was from the city of Thyatira
She bought and sold expensive dark red cloth
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 비싼 자주색 옷감을 팔고 샀다

sentences.original_text: The Lord helped her to understand Paul's message
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그녀가 바울의 메시지를 이해하도록 도우셨다

sentences.original_text: So she believed the things that he said
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그녀는 그가 말한 것들을 믿었다
